title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-pwa
author: oeyoews
name: Neotw Pwa
description: 让你的TiddlyWiki网页像app一样启动
readme: * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-pwa]] > 让你的 TiddlyWiki 网页像 app 一样启动 > make your TiddlyWiki web page start like an app > 注意：额外提供了 favicon.ico > 注意：不要使用 0.0.0.0:xxx, 请使用 127.0.0.1:xxx > 由于 tiddlywiki.png 使用了全透明，中间的白色部分是透明的，在 iphone 上看不到 (全部自动补充成了黑色) * ref: https://github.com/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-starter-kit/commit/47b9530a2049a43b26f30094c77d8483282e59d7 !! Setup <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-pwa/routes/get-manifest.js!!overwrite" text="yes"> <$button class="bg-green-400 p-2"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-pwa/routes/get-tiddlywiki-image.js" $field="overwrite" $value="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-pwa/routes/get-manifest.js" $field="overwrite" $value="yes"/> Enable PWA 📦 <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-pwa/routes/get-manifest.js!!overwrite" text="yes"> <$button class="bg-rose-400 p-2"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-pwa]field:overwrite[yes]]"/> Reset PWA ♻️ > 设置后需要重启 tw, 不是刷新浏览器 > After setting, you need to restart tw, not refresh the browser > 下面是针对构建在线版本支持 pwa 的参数 > The following are parameters for building online version to support pwa ``` "--savetiddler", "$:/manifest.json", "manifest.json", "--savetiddler", "$:/tiddlywiki.png", "tiddlywiki.png", ``` !!
